img.alt: location of Wolfe county on a map
img.figcaption: Location of Wolfe County within the state of Kentucky

section.p: Wolfe County is a county equivalent area found in Kentucky, USA. The county government of Wolfe is found in the county seat of Campton.

With a total 576.92 sq. km of land and water area, Wolfe County, Kentucky is the 2988th largest county equivalent area in the United States. Home to 7,214 people, Wolfe County has a total 3623 households earning 22574 on average per year.
